body.name: NATIVO Ceramic Nonstick Frypan Skillet, 7 inch Nontoxic Fry Pan with Ergonomic Handle, Spoon Rest Knob, Perfect Seal Lid, Egg frying pan, Omelet Pan with Silicone Spatula (RED)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: PREMIUM QUALITY: Our grey 7 inches Nativo frypan is crafted with nontoxic nonstick ceramic, ensuring safe and healthy cooking while preventing food from sticking. The high-quality forged aluminum construction adds extra durability, making it a long-lasting addition to your kitchen arsenal. Our Premium quality stands out from all other non stick frying pans.

ERGONOMIC AND CONVENIENT: The nonstick pan features an ergonomic stay-cool handle, providing a comfortable grip and allowing you to confidently maneuver the pan while cooking. It also comes with a convenient spoon rest, keeping your countertops clean and organized.

PERFECTLY SEALED LID: Our frypan includes a good lid with a reliable seal, allowing for efficient heat retention and moisture locking. This ensures that your dishes are cooked evenly and to perfection, while minimizing splatters and spills.

SAFETY IN MIND: The frypan comes with a protective rim for the glass lid, offering additional safety and preventing accidental breakage. The nontoxic nonstick ceramic coating is also scratch-resistant, making it ideal for use with metal utensils. As an added bonus, a silicone spatula is included, ensuring you have the right tool for every cooking task.

PRACTICAL SIZE : With its 7-inch size, our grey Nativo frypan is perfect for everyday cooking needs, whether you're sautéing vegetables, frying eggs, or making a delicious omelet. Its compact design makes it suitable for small kitchens or for those who prefer a lightweight and easy-to-handle frying pan.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We stand behind the quality of our product, which is why we offer a 1-year warranty policy. Rest assured knowing that your purchase is protected and that our customer service team is always ready to assist you with any concerns or inquiries.
body.description: Introducing the grey 7 inches Nativo frypan, a culinary essential that combines top-notch quality with innovative features. Crafted with nontoxic nonstick ceramic and forged aluminum, this frypan ensures both healthy cooking and long-lasting durability. The ergonomic stay-cool handle offers comfort and control, while the convenient spoon rest keeps your kitchen mess-free. The good lid with a reliable seal locks in heat and moisture, resulting in perfectly cooked dishes. With a protective rim for the glass lid and a scratch-resistant surface, this frypan is built for safety and practicality. As an added bonus, it comes with a silicone spatula, making it a complete cooking package. Compact and versatile, this 7-inch frypan is ideal for various culinary tasks and is perfect for smaller kitchens. Elevate your cooking experience with the grey Nativo frypan and enjoy effortless, mess-free meals every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Pan For Non Cookers
reviews.reviewText: The NATIVO Ceramic Nonstick Frypan Skillet is a game-changer in the kitchen! Its 7-inch size makes it light and easy to handle, perfect for quick meals or delicate recipes. The nonstick surface is a dream—it's a breeze to clean, saving precious time and effort after cooking.One of its standout features is the glass lid, allowing you to effortlessly monitor your food's progress while it cooks. This skillet doesn't just cook; it cooks fast! The efficiency is remarkable, especially for busy days when you need meals pronto.What's even better is the fantastic price point for such a high-quality kitchen essential. This skillet truly offers tremendous value for its performance and convenience. Plus, the added spoon rest knob and silicone spatula make it an all-in-one solution for your cooking needs.Overall, the NATIVO Ceramic Nonstick Frypan Skillet is a must-have for anyone seeking ease, speed, and quality in their cooking experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The coolest fry pan ever!
reviews.reviewText: What is not to love about this pan … size, lid, spatula, non toxic, non stick, color (crazy about the red!). Ordering one now for my sister for her birthday—in July —- just in case it is not available then.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got the red 7 inch skillet. It's made very sturdy. Nothing sticks to it and very easy to clean. I love that it has a lid! Two fried eggs fit in it perfectly. This is great for a single person!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice little pan!
reviews.reviewText: Very nonstick! Absolutely need to wash by hand ( pan not lid) due to rubberized coating coming off the back of the handle when put in the dishwasher. But very easy to hand wash. Great for eggs, omelets, hash browns, grilled cheese...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice, small fry pan. It's large enough to fit on a small burner, the weight keeps it securely in place, it heats up evenly. I really like having the matching glass lid, it would be hard to buy one of that size separately. One problem, the lid does steam up when cooking so I'm not able to see inside the pan. I'm using it for eggs, I do add a bit of butter, but I think you could do without any oil/butter if you prefer. The eggs move around the pan smoothly, no sticking. Cleanup is very easy. Time will tell if the non-stick holds up over time, but I don't plan to use it frequently. The red pan and lid are very cheerful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small Frypan!
reviews.reviewText: This pan replaced an older small pan that had become used up. I use it about every morning to cook eggs without having to use any spray or oil. The eggs don't stick. It washes off really easy after using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was good for the first three weeks, now it’s like any pan. But

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but perfect
reviews.reviewText: This little frying pan is perfect for small items and it’s truly nonstick.

reviews.reviewTitle: Small & Mighty for cooking a great Omelet
reviews.reviewText: I did not realize that it was so small but I made an omelet and it turned out wonderful so it is great for Omelet. I was pleasantly surprised.
Love that it comes with a lid and spatula.
